```py
       scp <filename> pi@<IP address>:<destination>
 scp my_file pi@192.168.1.2:/home/pi/Documents

```

```py
       scp pi@<IP address>:<file location> <local destination>
 scp pi@192.168.1.2:/home/pi/Documents/myfile Documents

```
